column4: Hey, Can anyone explain why/how Firefox is playing Flash without a Flash plug in installed?
Why can't I see it in Synaptic
about:plugins
load that in Fx. what does it say?
what does about:plugins tell you?
no, that's a single plugin
i suggest you look carefully
In Synaptic?
no, in about:plugins
I only see three entries related to flash. One large category for flash and video/flv
how many *actual plugins* are listed there?
do NOT cofuse plugins with their MIME type associations
and the answer to your original question is "you have the Flash plugin installed. that's why you can see Flash."
If I have the flash plugin installed then why can't I see it in Synaptic or dpkg --get-selections
did you install it with Synaptic?
I don't remember
sudo updatedb && locate libflashplayer.so
Ok so that found it. Now how do I uninstall that. Or do I just delete it.
found it *where*?
then it was probably installed via the package system
why do you want to remove it?
killall pulseaudio
